## Summary of Iris dataset

```{r iris}
summary(iris)
```


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=5, fig.height=5}
ggplot(data=iris,mapping=aes(x=Sepal.Length,y=Petal.Length))+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(x=Sepal.Length,y=Petal.Length))
```
